A

addProgressListener(ProgressListener) - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Adds the specified listener to handle ProgressEvents.

C

completed() - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Marks this ProgressMonitor as completed, publishing the final ProgressEvent if necessary.

D

DEFAULT_MAX_STEP_SIZE - Static variable in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
The default maximum step size.
DEFAULT_MIN_STEP_SIZE - Static variable in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
The default minimum step size.

G

getMaximum() - Method in interface software.leonov.progress.ProgressEvent
Returns the maximum value.
getMaximum() - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Returns the maximum value.
getProgress() - Method in interface software.leonov.progress.ProgressEvent
Returns the current progress.
getProgress() - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Returns the progress count.

I

increment() - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Increments the progress count by 1, publishing a ProgressEvent if necessary.
isDone() - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Returns true if this ProgressMonitor has completed.

O

onUpdate(String) - Method in class software.leonov.progress.Percentage
Receives the formatted percent value as a calculation of the progress against the maximum value.

P

Percentage - Class in software.leonov.progress
A skeletal implementation of the ProgressListener interface which calculates the progress value as a percentage of the maximum value.
Percentage() - Constructor for class software.leonov.progress.Percentage
Creates a new Percentage ProgressListener.
Percentage(DecimalFormat) - Constructor for class software.leonov.progress.Percentage
Creates a new Percentage ProgressListener which uses the specified DecimalFormat to format the percent value.
Percentage(Locale, String) - Constructor for class software.leonov.progress.Percentage
Creates a new Percentage ProgressListener which uses the specified Locale and pattern to format the percent value.
progressChanged(ProgressEvent) - Method in class software.leonov.progress.Percentage
Receives a progress changed event.
progressChanged(ProgressEvent) - Method in interface software.leonov.progress.ProgressListener
Receives a progress changed event.
ProgressEvent - Interface in software.leonov.progress
A ProgressEvent is used to notify ProgressListeners that the progress has changed.
ProgressListener - Interface in software.leonov.progress
A listener interface for handling progress change events.
ProgressMonitor - Class in software.leonov.progress
A ProgressMonitor can be used to track the progress of a long running operation.
ProgressMonitor() - Constructor for class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Creates a new ProgressMonitor with the minimum and maximum step size set to ProgressMonitor.DEFAULT_MIN_STEP_SIZE and ProgressMonitor.DEFAULT_MAX_STEP_SIZE respectively.

R

reset() - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Resets this ProgressMonitor to its initial state, retaining all previously added ProgressListeners and the maximum value.

S

setDynamicStepSize(long, long) - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Sets the range for the step size, which dynamically adjusts as the progress count is updated using ProgressMonitor.increment() and ProgressMonitor.setProgress(long).
setMaximum(long) - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Sets the maximum value.
setProgress(long) - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Sets the progress count, publishing a ProgressEvent if necessary.
setStepSize(long) - Method in class software.leonov.progress.ProgressMonitor
Sets the specified constant step size.
software.leonov.progress - package software.leonov.progress
Core classes and interfaces.
